sect1.title: OpenLink BPEL Process Manager Process Redefine
sect1.para: This page shows information about to individually upload or provide external URI's for the bpel and wsdl files defining the process. When these are all provided the process is ready to be compiled.

sect3.title: Process name
sect3.para: The Process name cannot be changed.

sect3.title: Redefine by
sect3.para: Choose values from the list in order to import process or upload BPEL and WSDL files for redifing the process.

sect3.title: BPEL
sect3.para: This is the section for the bpel file for the process.

simplelist.member: Click to view the content of the bpel file. This will go to a separate page showing the xml content of the bpel file for the process.
Click to upload a new bpel file for the process. This will go to a separate page showing information about individually uploading or providing external URI's for the bpel file.

sect3.title: WSDL
sect3.para: This is the section for wsdl file for the process.

simplelist.member: Click to view the content of the wsdl file. This will go to a separate page showing the xml content of the wsdl file for the process.
Click to upload a new wsdl file for the process. This will go to a separate page showing information about individually uploading or providing external URI's for the wsdl file.

sect3.title: Partner Links
sect3.para: This is the section for Partner Links for the process.

simplelist.member: Click to view the content of the wsdl for a Partner Link. This will go to a separate page showing the xml content of the wsdl file for the Partner Link.

Click to upload a new wsdl file for a Partner Link. This will go to a separate page showing information about individually uploading or providing external URI's for the wsdl file for the Partner Link.

sect3.title: Virtual Directory
sect3.para: When specified, the process will be exposed on this endpoint as a Web Service. Otherwise the endpoint for the process will be http://[host]:[port]/BPELGUI/bpel.vsp?script=[name of the process]

sect3.title: Action
sect3.para: This is the action section for the process.

simplelist.member: To delete the process click "Delete Process". This will go to a page giving confirmation option for deleting the process. If the process is deleted this action cannot be undone.
To compile the process click "Compile Process". When the compilation is successful, the process will be in state "Current" and will be ready for testing.

sect3.title: Authentication
sect3.para: This is the authentication section. When loading Deployment Descriptor expects authentication, you have to enter user name and paswword for the authentication.

simplelist.member: Enter the User name in the field "User".
Enter the password in the field "Password".

sect3.title: Load Deployment Descriptor from
sect3.para: This is the Deployment Descriptor section.

simplelist.member: All bpel and wsdl files referenced by the file at this URL will be loaded and will be ready to compile.
